definition: a light that flashes on and off, to put blinders on a horse
details:
noun
- a light that flashes on and off
= synonyms: flasher
- blind consisting of a leather eyepatch sewn to the side of the halter that prevents a horse from seeing something on either side
= synonyms: winker, blinder
- a blinking light on a motor vehicle that indicates the direction in which the vehicle is about to turn
= synonyms: turn signal, turn indicator, trafficator
verb
- to put blinders on a horse
= example: to put blinders on a horse
